Package org.cvs.application.security

Class AuthenticationFilter

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.filter.GenericFilterBean
org.springframework.security.web.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationProcessingFilter
org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter
org.cvs.application.security.AuthenticationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware, org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware, org.springframework.core.env.EnvironmentCapable, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
public class AuthenticationFilter
extends org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter
The AuthenticationFilter helps to authenticate the user via /users/login.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamiko J. Msosa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AuthenticationFilter​(org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager authenticationManager)
    Constructor for this AuthenticationFilter that also filters /users/login URL from authentication to reserve it for login operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthenticationFilter

      public AuthenticationFilter​(org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager authenticationManager)
      Constructor for this AuthenticationFilter that also filters /users/login URL from authentication to reserve it for login operations.

  • Method Details

    • attemptAuthentication

      public org.springframework.security.core.Authentication attemptAuthentication​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException
      Attempts to authenticate the user who has logged in via an HTTP post request.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      request - the HttpServletRequest object
      response - the HttpServletResponse object
